4. Send the message
5. Wait 3-5 seconds
6. Check your phone's lockscreen
7. Your emergency contact info should be displayed!

1. Send another text: "EMERGENCY_OFF"
2. Your original wallpaper returns automatically

‚úÖ SMS activation tested!

**STEP 3: Test Web Dashboard Activation (1 minute)**

1. Open a web browser (computer, tablet, or other phone)
2. Go to: https://finderr.app/dashboard
3. Sign in with your Google Account (same as FINDERR app)
4. Click the big "Activate Emergency Mode" button
